desc: Stuff is Linen, which is very Comfortable as Sleepwear and for Daily use as well. ❤2 PIECE PAJAMA SET - A Classic Pajama Set provides contrast stitching on Long-sleeve Tops, Paired with a Full-length Pants which have Elastic, Choose This Pajama Set as a great Gift for your family, friend and lover.
